MS MCQs

    Send an SMS message from a C# console application with Azure Communication Services

    »

    1. How can Azure Communication Services be used to send an SMS message?

      I can create a Communication Services resource using the Azure portal. This allows me to provision phone numbers.

      I can provision an SMS-enabled phone number that will allow me to send SMS messages.

      I can send an SMS message by using the Azure Communication Services client library.

      All of the above


    2. What can Azure Communication Services help you with?

      Azure Communication Services can help me send SMS messages with code.

      Azure Communication Services can help me place voice and video calls with code.

      Azure Communication Services can help me connect my existing application to Microsoft Teams.

      All of the above


    3. What scenarios are supported by Azure Communication Services?

      Browser-to-browser, browser-to-app, and app-to-app communication

      Users interacting with bots or other services.

      Users and bots interacting over the public switched telephony network

      All of the above
